## IPositionable interface

Interface for a component that is positioned on top of the workspace.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export interface IPositionable extends IComponent 
```
**Extends:** [IComponent](./blockly.icomponent_interface.md)

## Methods

|  Method | Description |
|  --- | --- |
|  [getBoundingRectangle()](./blockly.ipositionable_interface.getboundingrectangle_1_methodsignature.md) | Returns the bounding rectangle of the UI element in pixel units relative to the Blockly injection div. |
|  [position(metrics, savedPositions)](./blockly.ipositionable_interface.position_1_methodsignature.md) | Positions the element. Called when the window is resized. |
